name: Youth SF
description: YouthSF prepares students (K-12) from underserved populations to more actively participate in the digital revolution that is transforming our world. YSF’s student-run lab in San Francisco and afterschool programs are part computer lab, toy store, maker space, science lab, electronics shop, playground, and internet café. YouthSF provides dynamic learning environments bursting with stimulating ideas, products, and projects where students explore, discover, play, create, collaborate and… learn...wi
